signals.title: Ask HN: Is there a tool that monitors competitor pricing automatically?
signals.summary: Founder looking for automated competitor price tracking across 50+ sites. Willing to pay $50-100/mo.

signals.title: I'd pay good money for a Zapier alternative that actually handles errors well
signals.summary: Developer frustrated with Zapier's error handling. Multiple replies agreeing. No one has built a reliability-first alternative.

signals.title: Ask HN: How do you manage multiple AI API subscriptions and costs?
signals.summary: CTO looking for unified AI spend tracking across OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini. 490+ points, only manual spreadsheet solutions suggested.

signals.title: Show HN: I built a Notion-to-blog pipeline but it breaks every week
signals.summary: Creator wants reliable Notion-to-static-site publishing. Existing tools break on API changes. Users asking for paid alternative.

signals.title: Ask HN: Best way to do SOC 2 compliance as a 3-person startup?
signals.summary: Tiny team needs SOC 2 for enterprise deals. Current tools cost $20k+. Multiple founders asking for a $500/mo alternative.

signals.title: Why is there no good open-source Calendly alternative?
signals.summary: Thread debating why self-hosted scheduling tools all feel half-baked. Several devs expressing willingness to pay for a polished OSS option.

signals.title: Ask HN: How are you handling LLM output evaluation in production?
signals.summary: ML engineer asking for production-grade LLM eval tools. No clear winner mentioned. Teams building custom solutions from scratch.
